title: builld with adapter-static/auto and dynamic route leads to Missing parameter 'path' in route /[...path]
body:
### Describe the bug

When i build my app with adapter-static/auto, i get the following error:                 ^
Error: Missing parameter 'path' in route /[...path]
I tried both with crawling disabled and enabled and providing entries.
Also i tried with the load function directly in the +page.server.js instead of layout, but the error is the same.
Normally the entries are coming from a restapi of a CMS.
Without providing entries a got always the error that not all routes are found by the crawler.

### Reproduction

```npm run build``` 

with this repo:
https://github.com/MrTango/sveltekit-routing-test

### Logs

```Shell
node:internal/event_target:1006
  process.nextTick(() => { throw err; });
                           ^
Error: Missing parameter 'path' in route /[...path]
    at file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/index.js:137:13
    at String.replace (<anonymous>)
    at file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/index.js:131:13
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at resolvePath (file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/exports/index.js:130:5)
    at file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/postbuild/analyse.js:148:56
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at analyse (file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/core/postbuild/analyse.js:148:34)
    at async MessagePort.<anonymous> (file:///home/maik/develop/src/svelteplayground/plone.sveltekit/resources/routingtest/node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@1.20.2_svelte@3.59.1_vite@4.3.9/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/utils/fork.js:22:16)
Emitted 'error' event on Worker instance at:
    at [kOnErrorMessage] (node:internal/worker:290:10)
    at [kOnMessage] (node:internal/worker:301:37)
    at MessagePort.<anonymous> (node:internal/worker:202:57)
    at [nodejs.internal.kHybridDispatch] (node:internal/event_target:731:20)
    at exports.emitMessage (node:internal/per_context/messageport:23:28)

Node.js v18.12.1
```

    OS: Linux 6.1 Debian GNU/Linux 11 (bullseye) 11 (bullseye)
    CPU: (16) x64 AMD Ryzen 7 PRO 5850U with Radeon Graphics

### Severity

serious, but I can work around it

### Additional Information

_No response_
